title: ELV_CurPol_NPi
description: ELV_CurPol_T44: The Current Policies scenarios describe energy, climate and economic projections for the period until 2030. In the default setting carbon prices converges after 2030 over all regions to $25 eoc.

title: ELV_CurPol_NPi2025
description: ELV_CurPol_NPi2025: The Current Policies scenarios describe energy, climate and economic projections for the period until 2030 with new expert guess for 2025 and 2030 (EUR only). After 2030 each region has a linear price increase of $20 eoc.

title: ELV-SSP2-CP-D0
description: ELV-SSP2-CP-D0: The Current Policies scenarios describe energy, climate and economic projections for the period until 2030 with new expert guess for 2025 and 2030 (EUR only). After 2030 each region keeps the carbon price constant.

title: ELV-SSP2-CP-D1
description: ELV-SSP2-CP-D1: The Current Policies scenarios describe energy, climate and economic projections for the period until 2030 with new expert guess for 2025 and 2030 (EUR only). After 2030 each region increases their carbon price by 1%.

title: ELV-SSP2-CP-D3
description: ELV-SSP2-CP-D3: The Current Policies scenarios describe energy, climate and economic projections for the period until 2030 with new expert guess for 2025 and 2030 (EUR only). After 2030 each region increases their carbon price by 3%.

title: ELV_NDC2030
description: ELV_NDC2030: The NDCs scenario aims to represent the goals of each country or region defined in their NDCs. The ambition levels reached in the target year remains at least constant throughout the rest of the century.

title: ELV-SSP2-NDC-D0
description: ELV-SSP2-NDC-D0: The NDCs scenario aims to represent the goals of each country or region defined in their NDCs. The ambition levels reached in the target year remains constant throughout the rest of the century.

title: ELV-SSP2-NDC-D1
description: ELV-SSP2-NDC-D1: The NDCs scenario aims to represent the goals of each country or region defined in their NDCs. The ambition levels reached in the target year increases by 1%.

title: ELV-SSP2-NDC-D3
description: ELV-SSP2-NDC-D3: The NDCs scenario aims to represent the goals of each country or region defined in their NDCs. The ambition levels reached in the target year increases by 3%.

title: ELV-SSP2-LTS
description: ELV-SSP2-LTS: High uncoordinated ambition (Considering the mid-century strategy pledges (net-zero) announced at COP26 in Glasgow.)

title: ELV-SSP2-NDC-LTS
description: ELV-SSP2-NDC-LTS: The scenario reaches NDC pleages in 2030 and converges to the Glasgow mid-century pledges.

title: ELV-SSP2-1000
description: ELV-SSP2-1000:This climate policy scenario follows the Shared Socioeconomic Pathways 2 called Middle of the Road. The stylized climate policy scenario assumes a peak budget of 1000 Gt CO2 on total CO2 emissions from 2020 to 2000. This is a well below 2C scenario at median climate sensitivity but returns to values below 2C in at least 67 % of scenarios during the whole century.

title: ELV-SSP2-650
description: ELV-SSP2-500: This climate policy scenario follows the Shared Socioeconomic Pathways 2 called Middle of the Road. The stylized climate policy scenario assumes a peak budget of 500 Gt CO2 on total CO2 emissions from 2015 to 2100. This is a 1.5C scenario, peak warming is allowed to be well below 1.5C at median climate sensitivity but returns to values below 1.5C in at least 67 % of scenarios by the end of the century.
